Plot: Ryan Bingham enjoys living out of a suitcase for his job, travelling around the country firing people, but finds that lifestyle threatened by the presence of a potential love interest, and a new hire.
Writer: Walter Kirn (novel), Jason Reitman (screenplay), Sheldon Turner (screenplay)
Actors: George Clooney, Vera Farmiga, Anna Kendrick, Jason Bateman
Awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. Another 76 wins & 158 nominations.
Title: Up in the Air
